Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Stay”
Reviews.Author: calamaestra
Reviews.Content: choose hotel proximity central train station leading students adults enjoyed stay overall staff nice night guy didnt speak english decent size refrigerator clean cleaned everyday break included fresh fruit options quiet wifi free floor students complained weaker floor annoying username password 24 hours wifi absolutely stay

Reviews.Title: “Worst Everrrrr”
Reviews.Author: Marc M
Reviews.Content: maybe 3 stars hotel maybe decoration 3 stars hotel normal forget breakfast tea coffee cake ahh couple cheese slices false fire alarm twice 1 day 1st 9pm 2nd 4 am imagine night stuff safe box safe 1 day complained bed reception guy decision change transferred luggage noticing safe box transferred permission indication reception whatever ur hotel awful worst hotel price offering central rome city center

Reviews.Title: “terrible room, awful attitude!”
Reviews.Author: pogleswood186338
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 50th bithday celebration travelled 21 son specified twin arrived claimed didnt twin agreed camp bed 1 night move twin day completely unsuitable son 5 tall morning politely readythe aggressive manager told accepted camp bed night wouldnt move upset hotel incur cost check apologies please complain easy jet write bad review trip advisor tod appauling hotel shabby backstreet breakfast despite reviews poor fresh fruit dont possibly avoid hotels nearer colusseum money additionally hotel noisy night walls paper thin

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for this price”
Reviews.Author: CityTrip2gether
Reviews.Content: january 2011 stayed 3 nights hotel female staff friendly clean thin woolen blankets duvet sound insulation noise tired evening loud hear noise breakfast ok cereals toast fruits cheese cold cuts wifi free 15 minutes walk termini 3 minutes metro station manzoni

Reviews.Title: “great value”
Reviews.Author: stekayLiege
Reviews.Content: bargain rome frills english tv own dont forget adapter clean confortable beds quiet location close metro walk town copious breakfast quaint theres grand piano gifted eggs poor coffeewhich shame country roof top terrace aperitifs impressive view towards san giovanni staff friendly easy connect ciampino termini ie metro bus

Reviews.Title: “The Price is Right”
Reviews.Author: Tony_R55
Reviews.Content: service staff friendly standard comfortable bed clean day perfect located quiet street walking distance restaurant called romantica walk train station termini close metro stop free breakfast forgettable laptop lobby connect www complaining price 100 canadian night

Reviews.Title: “Helpful Staff, quiet room”
Reviews.Author: skygoddessDenver
Reviews.Content: arrived day expected alerted hotel werent charged fro werent putting triple didnt moved double perfect quiet clean air conditioning extra charge pleasant helpful stay oh block half metro
